name: Bertram The Pomeranian
description: Meet $BERT - Dog Mayor of Solana. Community-powered with a mission to help dogs worldwide. Doing good, one paw at a time. Abandoned by breeders, adopted and crowned by the people of Solana. Bert is a popular dog with 400k followers ​on Instagram, that looks like a teddy bear. His journey started on Pump.fun, dev ​abandoned him. Then, the community decided ​to adopt Bert and the rest is history... This is memecoin that is not connected to the original dog or its owner. It is not official Bertram coin It is a pure fun coin with no intrinsic value and can’t be considered as investment.
